name: Gravity Memory Game + Editable
description:
Support us in Patreon/Apoyanos en Patreon

EDITABLE GAME MAKER STUDIO 1 / 2.

Have you been part of the blinded eye society?
Discover how well your memories are and solve the mystery.

EDITABLES GAME MAKER 1 - 2:

[GMS 1-2 Simple Mechanical Edit] Gravity Game Memory.gmz - The project in its version with only mechanics that you can implement.

[GMS 1-2 Full + ADS + Online] Gravity Game Memory.gmz - The complete editable project, with code for your ads, and online scorecards, you can use them in other projects.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

¿Has sido parte de la sociedad del ojo cegado?
Descubre que tan bien estan tus memorias y resuelve el misterio.

EDITABLES GAME MAKER 1 - 2:

[GMS 1-2 Edit Simple Mecanica] Gravity Game Memory.gmz - El proyecto en su version con solo mecanicas que puedes implementar.

[GMS 1-2 Full+ADS+Online] Gravity Game Memory.gmz - El proyecto editable completo, con codigo para tus anuncios, y tablas de puntaje online, puedes usarlos en otros proyectos.
